name: 吳昭正
objective: 布林代數與邏輯閘，組合邏輯，算術演算邏輯，同步循序邏輯，演繹狀態機，非同步循序邏輯。
schedule:
Week 1. Introduction 
Week 2. Number systems 
Week 3. Boolean Algebra (I) 
Week 4. Boolean Algebra (II) & Applications of Boolean algebra minterm and maxterm expansions (I)
Week 5. Holiday; Applications of Boolean algebra minterm and maxterm expansions (II)
Week 6. Karnaugh Maps (I)
Week 7. Karnaugh Maps (II)
Week 8. Quine-McClusky Method 
Week 9. Midterm Exam
Week 10. Multi-Level Gate Circuits NAND and NOR Gates
Week 11. Combinational Circuit Design and Simulation Using Gates
Week 12. Multiplexers, Decoders, and Programmable Logic Devices (I)
Week 13. Multiplexers, Decoders, and Programmable Logic Devices (II)
Week 14. Latches and Flip-Flops (I)
Week 15. Latches and Flip-Flops (II)
Week 16. Registers and Counters (I)
Week 17. Registers and Counters (II)
Week 18. Final Exam
scorePolicy:
Homework exams 30%
Midterm 30%
Final 30%
Attendance 10%
Class Participation 10%
materials: Fundamentals of Logic Design Enhanced, 7th Edition, by Charles H. Roth, Jr. , Larry L. Kinney , Eugene B. John, Pearson FT Press, 2020
